wikipedia_page.main: Phil Simmons (born 6 February 1975) is a British rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 2004 Summer Olympics.

Phil Simmons is a fan of English football club Tottenham Hotspur.http://www.tottenhamhotspur.com/spurs-tv/features/west-indies-pair-bowled-over-at-the-lane/ His nephew Lendl Simmons is also a West Indian cricket player.
